'''SkyBox Labs''' is a Canadian game development studio based out of {{w|Burnaby}}, {{w|British Columbia}}, {{w|Canada}}. The studio was brought on to assist with bringing {{el|be}} to {{w|Nintendo Switch}} and {{w|PlayStation 4}},<ref>https://skyboxlabs.com/news/skybox-labs-brings-bedrock-version-of-minecraft-to-nintendo-switch/</ref><ref>https://skyboxlabs.com/games/minecraft-nintendo-switch/</ref><ref>https://skyboxlabs.com/games/minecraft-playstation4/</ref> as well as implementing [[VR]] support to the latter.<ref>https://blog.playstation.com/2020/09/07/minecraft-adds-ps-vr-support-this-month/</ref>

On January 6, 2023, {{w|NetEase Games}} announced that they had acquired SkyBox Labs for an undisclosed amount.<ref> https://www.neteasegames.com/m/news/game/20230106/30576_1061765.html</ref>

== Games ==
SkyBox Labs has published the following original games:
*''TASTEE: Lethal Tactics'' (PC, 2016)
*''Stela'' (PC/ONE/NSwitch/iOS, 2019-2020)

They have also ported/remade/co-developed the following games: 
*''{{w|Age of Empires II: The Forgotten}}'' (PC, 2013) 
*''{{w|Age of Mythology|Age of Mythology: Extended Edition}}'' (PC/OSX, 2014) 
*''{{w|Rise of Nations|Rise of Nations Extended Edition}}'' (PC, 2014) 
*''{{w|EA Sports UFC}}'' (ONE/PS4/iOS/Android, 2014-2015) 
*''{{w|Project Spark}}'' (PC/ONE, 2014)
*''Protocol Zero VR'' (GearVR, 2015) 
*''{{w|Grandia II|Grandia II Anniversary Edition}}'' (PC, 2015) 
*''{{w|Age of Empires II#Age of Empires II HD: The African Kingdoms|Age of Empires II HD: The African Kingdoms}}'' (PC, 2015)
*''{{w|Halo 5: Guardians}}'' (ONE, 2015)
*''{{w|Age of Mythology|Age of Mythology: Tale of the Dragon}}'' (PC/OSX, 2016)  
*''{{w|Halo 5: Guardians#Halo 5: Forge|Halo 5: Forge}}'' (PC, 2016)  
*''{{w|Age of Empires II#Age of Empires II HD: Rise of the Rajas|Age of Empires II HD: Rise of the Rajas}}'' (PC, 2016)
*''[[Bedrock Edition|Minecraft: Bedrock Edition]]'' (2017)
*''{{w|Fallout 76}}'' (PC/ONE/PS4, 2018)
*''{{w|Magic: The Gathering Arena}}'' (PC/macOS, 2019-2020)
*''{{w|Halo Infinite}}'' (PC/Xbox, 2021)
*''{{w|Destiny 2: Lightfall}}'' (PC/PlayStation/Xbox, 2023)
